Strong Girl Nam-soon

2023 | 1 Season | Comedies

Gifted with superhuman strength, a young woman returns to Korea to find her birth family — only to be entangled in a drug case that could test her power.

Starring:Lee You-mi,Kim Jung-eun,Kim Hae-sook

Watch all you want.

Desperate for a reunion, Hwang Geum-ju seemingly finds her long-lost daughter. After discovering the truth, Gang Nam-soon prepares for her trip to Korea.
